channel.title: Instagram search tools
channel.description:
Hello, I have an Instagram account and I want to find all of the posts that this account liked, commented or... When I use `"account name" site:instagram.com` in Google then I can't find any useful result :frowning: How can I do it? If the account is private then any trick to find his\her follower or following friends?
Thank you.

item.title: Instagram search tools
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
